description: Visual & Creative View patterns for freeform, visual, and media-focused interfaces

views.name: Canvas View
views.description: Infinite 2D space for freeform drawing, diagramming, or spatial organization
hig_guidelines: Support pan and zoom gestures with smooth animations
Provide clear visual boundaries or infinite canvas indicators
Include a minimap for navigation in large canvases
Support undo/redo operations with clear feedback
Use consistent object manipulation handles
accessibility: Provide keyboard alternatives for all mouse operations
Announce object selection and position changes
Support screen reader navigation of canvas objects
Offer high contrast mode for visual elements

views.name: Whiteboard View
views.description: Collaborative drawing surface with sticky notes and markers
hig_guidelines: Use familiar drawing metaphors (pen, marker, eraser)
Support multi-touch for collaborative scenarios
Provide clear tool indicators and cursor changes
Auto-save frequently to prevent data loss
Support real-time collaboration indicators
accessibility: Provide text alternatives for drawn content

views.name: Gallery View
views.description: Horizontal scrolling showcase for high-fidelity media
hig_guidelines: Support swipe gestures for intuitive navigation
Show clear position indicators (dots, numbers)
Preload adjacent items for smooth transitions
Support pinch-to-zoom on individual items
Provide autoplay option with pause control
accessibility: Announce current position and total count
Provide image descriptions for screen readers

views.name: Card Stack View
views.description: Tinder-style swipeable interface for quick decision-making
hig_guidelines: Provide clear swipe direction feedback (visual + haptic)
Show remaining card count or progress
Support undo for accidental swipes
Use haptic feedback for swipe completion
Indicate swipe thresholds visually
accessibility: Provide button alternatives to swipe gestures

views.name: Masonry View
views.description: Pinterest-style grid where items of different heights fit together optimally
hig_guidelines: Maintain consistent gutters between items
Load images progressively for performance
Support infinite scroll with loading indicators
Preserve scroll position on window resize
Optimize layout recalculation

views.name: Lightbox View
views.description: Focused overlay for viewing images or media without leaving context
hig_guidelines: Dim background appropriately (not completely black)
Support keyboard navigation (arrows, escape)
Provide clear close affordance
Support pinch-to-zoom and double-tap zoom
Show navigation controls on hover
